questionHeader: Of the following 6 stakeholders, pick the 2 you think is most negatively affected by Graceramics' business activities

alternatives.alternativeText: a) The marine life in the small river just nearby Graces' workshop
b) Children under 12 working where the clay is excavated
c) Max, the employee, wants higher wage
d) People growing food in the surrounding neighbourhood
e) The local council chairman representing the area
f) The neighbouring market place and sellers of ceramic products
